character.name: Terry Bogard
character.description: Aggressive rushdown character with strong pressure tools and comeback potential
character.bio: The Legendary Hungry Wolf. This charismatic fighter travels the globe, eager to test his strength against warriors from all corners of the world.

neutral.name: Neutral Tactics
neutral.description: Moves for controlling space and starting offense

offensive.name: Offensive Pressure
offensive.description: Moves for maintaining pressure and mix-ups

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for pressure and frame traps. Can be rapid canceled.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Very safe. Can be rapid canceled.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for quick pokes and pressure
Use for spacing and confirms into specials
Use for max range control in neutral
Use for counter hits and pressure. PLUS ON BLOCK (+1). 2 frames recovery subtracted when blocked.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: PLUS ON BLOCK! Terry can continue pressure.

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Heavy kick with crumple on Punish Counter
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for counter hits. Produces crumple stun on Punish Counter with +18 frame advantage.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Safe on block. Causes crumple stun on Punish Counter.

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Fast crouching jab with rapid cancel
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for pressure and light confirms. Can be rapid canceled.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Very safe. Can be rapid canceled.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for low mixups and tick throws. Can be rapid canceled.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Safe low option. Must be blocked low.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use as anti-air or for confirms into specials.
Use for low pokes and spacing. Cancelable.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Punishable by 6-frame moves. Must be blocked low.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Primary anti-air. Forces opponent to stand. 3 frames recovery subtracted on hit or block.
Use for knockdown. Hard Knockdown on Punish Counter.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 11. Causes knockdown. Must be blocked low.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for air-to-air situations
Use for air-to-air situations
Use for air-to-air or cross-ups. Has cross-up properties.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Air normal with cross-up properties. 3 frames landing recovery.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for jump-ins. Forces juggle on mid-air hit.
Use for jump-ins. Slam knockdown on counter/Punish Counter vs air.
Use for jump-ins with good horizontal range
Use for pressure and confirms
Use for confirms into knockdown

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Safe on block. Causes knockdown on hit.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for confirms into knockdown

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: VERY PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 14. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for combo extensions. Launches opponent.
Use for evasion and mixups. Fully invincible frames 20-40 on hit only.
Use for confirms. Completely invincible frames 1-25. Airborne frames 14-25.
Use for confirms. Completely invincible frames 1-25. Airborne frames 16-25.
Use for combo starters

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: VERY PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 16. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for spacing and whiff punishes
Use as anti-air
Use for zoning and space control. Slowest version.
Use for zoning with medium speed
Use for pressure. PLUS ON BLOCK (+5) and PLUS ON HIT (+8).

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: PLUS ON BLOCK (+5)! Terry can continue pressure.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for pressure. Plus on hit (+2) and safe on block (-2).
Use for pressure and combos.
Use for combos and pressure.
Use for combos and approaching.
Use for combos and long range approaches.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 8. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for combos. Juggle state extended on Punish Counter.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 8. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for pressure and combos.
Use for combos.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 11. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Heavy shoulder tackle with special cancel
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for combos. Changes to juggle state on mid-air hit. Can cancel into other specials except Power Charge on hit only.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: VERY PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 16. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for combos.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: VERY PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 14. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for overhead mixups. Airborne frames 7-23. Hard Knockdown on Punish Counter.
Use for overhead mixups. Airborne frames 9-25. Hard Knockdown on counter and Punish Counter.
Use for combos. Airborne frames 12-34. Nearly safe on block (-1).

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Safe on block. Only minus 1. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for combos. Airborne frames 8-25. Hard Knockdown on Punish Counter. Floor bound on mid-air hit.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Safe on block. Only minus 2. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use as anti-air. Invincible vs mid-air projectiles and strikes with mid-air hitboxes frames 1-14. Airborne frames 6-35.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: DEATH ON BLOCK. Minus 25. Full combo punish.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use as anti-air or combo ender. Invincible vs mid-air projectiles and strikes with mid-air hitboxes frames 1-10. Airborne frames 8-43.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: DEATH ON BLOCK. Minus 26. Full combo punish.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use as anti-air. Invincible vs mid-air projectiles and strikes with mid-air hitboxes frames 1-8. Airborne frames 8-53.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: DEATH ON BLOCK. Minus 36. Full combo punish.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use as reversal. Completely invincible frames 1-10. Airborne frames 7-54.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: DEATH ON BLOCK. Minus 42. Full combo punish.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use as reversal or combo ender. Completely invincible frames 1-9. Minimum damage 600 (30%). Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter.
Use for combos. Super Armor vs mid-air and ground attacks 1 hit frames 6-26. Minimum damage 1040 (40%). Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter.
Use as anti-air. Invincible vs mid-air frames 1-20. Minimum damage 960 (40%). Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter.
Use for max damage or reversal. Completely invincible frames 1-16. Minimum damage 2250 (50%). Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter. Can only be canceled into from special moves.

Use for max damage when under 25% health. Completely invincible frames 1-16. Minimum damage 2500 (50%). Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter. Can only be canceled into from special moves.
Use for air approach. Can only be performed during forward jump. Airborne 1 - until landing.
Use for throw mixups. On Punish Counter: 2040 damage, +4000 SA gauge, hard knockdown.
Use for side switch and corner carry. On Punish Counter: 2040 damage, +4000 SA gauge, hard knockdown.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Throw. Tech with LP+LK. Switches sides.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to close distance quickly

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Quick backward movement with throw invincibility
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to escape pressure. Invincible to throws frames 1-21.

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Armored attack for pressure and punishes
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to absorb attacks and punish. Super Armor for 2 hits frames 1-27. Wall splat on hit near wall. On Punish Counter or after armor absorb: crumple stun (grounded), spinning knockdown (airborne), +3000 SA gauge.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Safe on block. Has Super Armor. Counter with your own Drive Impact or throw.

terry_drive_reversal_block.input: → + HP + HK (while blocking or during Drive Parry)

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to escape pressure while blocking. Completely invincible frames 1-22. Recoverable damage. 5 frames recovery added on hit.
Use to escape oki pressure. Completely invincible frames 1-20. Recoverable damage. 5 frames recovery added on hit.
Use to parry attacks. Can cancel from frame 4 via Drive Rush. Parry hitbox extended while buttons held. Only blocks during recovery. Always in Punish Counter state during execution.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Terry is in Punish Counter state. Throw or wait for recovery.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Activates when attack absorbed on parry input frame or next frame. For high/overhead: press away. For low: press down-back. No direction = regular parry +3000 Drive. Fully invincible 5 frames after recovery (not if continuing parry). Opponent forced into Punish Counter state until move finished.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: You are in PUNISH COUNTER state until move finishes. Cannot cancel.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Activates when projectile absorbed on parry input frame or next frame. No screen freeze. Opponent forced into Punish Counter state until move finished.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: You are in PUNISH COUNTER state until move finishes. Cannot cancel.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to convert parry into offense. Screen freeze until frame 10. Can cancel into attack on frame 9. Can cancel into non-parry actions from frame 24.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Terry is rushing in. Prepare to block or contest.

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Cancel normal into run for combos
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for combo extensions. Screen freeze until frame 9. Can cancel into attack from frame 10. Can cancel into non-parry actions from frame 25.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Terry is canceling into run. Prepare for follow-up.
